attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Discovery foods once made a great range of mexican sauces for everyone, they have revamped the range and they are simply not the same! The best of the old range was the Discovery Mexican Sauce! Lets try and bring it back!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
